short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape Listings, Details, Reviews, and more from Temu, with options to export in formats such as CSV, Excel, JSON, and others.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Temu Data Extractor & Downloader - Export Listings, Product Details, Reviews, Provider Details, Cart, Orders to many different formats.

Overview:
This powerful Temu data extraction tool enables you to automatically download and convert Listings, Product Details, Reviews, Provider Details, Cart, Orders into multiple formats including CSV, Excel, and JSON. Our scraper extracts detailed information from search results, product pages, etc., making it the perfect tool for Marketers, Researchers, Developers, Businesses.

Key Features:
✓ Extract data from search results, product pages, provider pages, etc.
✓ Export to multiple formats
✓ Automatic pagination and data collection
✓ Pagination support
✓ Export to multiple formats

What Data You Can Extract:
• Listings
  - Product Name
  - Price
• Product Details
  - Description
  - Specifications
• Reviews
  - User Comments
  - Ratings
• Provider Details
  - Provider Name
  - Contact Information
• Cart
  - Items
  - Total Price
• Orders
  - Order ID
  - Order Status

Perfect For:
Marketers: Analyze market trends and product performance
Researchers: Gather comprehensive data for studies
Developers: Integrate data into applications

Export Format Support:
• CSV - Perfect for spreadsheet analysis
• Excel (XLSX) - Formatted with proper data types
• JSON - Ideal for developers
• HTML Table - Easy to read and analyze
• XML - Structured data export
• TXT - Plain text format
• Raw JSON - Complete data access

Supported Countries/Sites:
All Temu Countries

Known Limitations:
Rate limits apply for non-Premium users
Requires user authentication

Technical Support:
Need assistance? Contact us: hello@nifty.codes
Feature requests & bug reports.

Privacy & Security:
Your login credentials are required to use this extension but are kept strictly confidential and never disclosed to third parties.
Exported data is formatted on our servers and never stored.

Last Update:
-Added Extract Order Items
-Added Extract Order Details
